description: Is a financial tool, through wich you get a bullet loan in your local currency, for an equivalent amount to the foreign currency needed at the SPOT exchange rate. Simultaneously, the loan will be applied to a sell position of the foreign currency in the futures market to the exactly same term and amount (k+i) as the loan. The operation offsets exchange rates differences: Selled Future VS Reference exchange rate at due date (e.g.: in Argentina would be Com. BCRA 3500).
